website_summaries.verdict: These silicone brushes are great for brushing butter and other liquids, and are easy to clean in the dishwasher when you're done.
pros: Will not melt, warp, discolor, shrink or shed in your food
Dishwasher safe, which prevents bacteria and mold build-up
Designed to mop up and hold generous amounts of liquid
Great for BBQ sauce and butter
cons: Good with liquids, but doesn't pick up particles like garlic and pepper as well

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: My issue with these is the strange grid piece in between the two layers of stringy pieces. If there was a third layer of stringy pieces instead, it would be much more effective. This is a cheapie. The individual strands are very thin and weak. I bought one made by OXO instead and it is well worth the few extra dollars for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: Wer put them in the kids doll house
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the pictures must be in miniature... these things would be great if you wanna baste your chickens feet. If you want to baste a turkey or mop your BBQ sauce this ain't the thing. They do work well on small things and cleanup easily, dishwasher didn't kill 'em. I gave it two stars because I think the pictures are deceptive. I know on the left coast that is a sign of good business practices but in the real world it's just deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: 65 Double Cab

customer_reviews.title: I have a similar basting brush and like it so much better than the old paint brush ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar basting brush and like it so much better than the old paint brush style, but it was always dirty when I needed it, so I decided to order this set. They are really wonderful, the quality is so much better than the one I have! The brush part detaches from the handle for easy cleaning. They have much smoother application and coverage. I use them for basting meats, spreading sauces and spreading melted butter on dough when baking. I just love these and they work perfectly. I am so happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wonderful basting brushes perform exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These wonderful basting brushes perform exactly as advertised. The larger brush holds a LOT of liquid (and mind, liquid ONLY, not smaller bits like spices; that's what the smaller brush is for) for covering large areas with fewer stops to re-dip. The smaller brush holds a really good amount of liquid as well but also holds those small bits like spices too. I've used it several times with a basil-rosemary egg wash on pizza crusts and calzones and it really holds those spices well. They come apart and re-assemble easily to wash up by hand, but they do NOT come apart during use. I am 1,000% pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Useful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are used for my smoker which is in use every weekend. Brushes are immune to the heat, easily cleaned and store well. I used to use big cotton "BBQ mops" which made a horrible mess in the smoker, were a pain to clean, and were essentially stored inside the smoker itself. Now I keep these in the kitchen and use them for daily chores as well as the big weekend chores in the smoker. A squirt bottle and these brushes are all that I use these days. Very useful. Sent quickly, packaged nicely and safely. Were exactly as ordered. I am happy with them. Highly recommended seller too.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These basters work pretty well. They have a silicone grid (see photo) sandwiched between the two sets of bristles which picks up more liquid than bristles alone. I threw my old brush away.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BBQ!!! Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are tiny!!!!! They are appropriately sized for buttering a croissant with melted butter, but being listed as BBQ brushes is ridiculous. Your had would have to be so close to the flame to use these brushes that ANY flare up would burn your hands. This is on me, because I should have checked the dimensions. I just don't want anyone else to make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that worked better than the bristle brushes to apply BBQ sauces. These work great and cleanup is extremely easy. Wish the handles were a couple inches longer when using them on the gas grille, but other than that I'm very impressed. Next I will use for spreading butter on the pancake griddle. My feelings are that these will work perfectly, not burning from momentary contact with the griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Doug O.

customer_reviews.title: Cold use +100...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not actually used it in a hot situation like a grill or from the oven. But I have used it to spread olive oil on chicken drumsticks and over the entirety of a turkey. Is very good for thick and thin liquids like I said olive oil, and it's extremely easy to clean either by hand or in the dishwasher has it melted lower deformed or change shape. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I think the "bristles" might be a bit thick. It's hard to apply sauces in a brushing motion because of the friction. Use a dabbing application, and you're golden. The grid in the middle holds on to the sauces well, and it's super easy to clean, which was my biggest worry with silicone. They don't stay greasy from oil-based sauces, etc. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Just James

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The brush heads fall off. Not like just drop off...but when I'm furiously greasing pans they can pop off. If I'm gently/moderately glazing or basting they're fine. The ease of cleaning more than makes up for self-decapitation thing. They don't hold on to gunk like my natural bristle brushes do. I will eventually buy more silicone brushes, but I'll prolly look for a one-piece design as opposed to this model's two-piece style.
customer_reviews.author: Copperrein

customer_reviews.title: Good brushes, great
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for basting. First set had a brush with bristles that fell apart for no reason. Without asking, the company sent me a new set. The second set has held up very well. Good brushes, great company
customer_reviews.author: Kiosk

customer_reviews.title: Great picker-upper
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The extra little square in center picks up more sauce so you can get more onto whatever you are saucing up. Cleaned up quick and easy in the dishwasher. Not positive about heat cause wasn't on heat very long but worked fine for what we used it for. Wished at least one had a little longer handle for grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These little silicone baster brushes are Fabulous!! I use them a lot and after 4 years of use they still look like new (look at my picture). Highly recomend them !
customer_reviews.author: Mojarra

customer_reviews.title: Better than a bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: Swapped my bristle basting brush for these and was immediately impressed. They hold much more liquid, making the task quicker. I mainly use for brushing the tops of rolls with butter or for basting BBQ chicken. Work great for those uses and can just toss them in the dishwasher. Will use this kind of basting brush from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Ruck

customer_reviews.title: Dollar Store Material
customer_reviews.text: They just don't look like something worth $8 for. The packaging looks like something from a dollar store. Not what I expected. Perhaps because I bought these brushes from my phone and didn't see the packaging that well. I've come across nicer brushes at Walmart and Target.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay for 4 years...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really complain. They worked for 4 years, but now, the handle has separate from the head part that has the bristles. I'm going to try to glue it together but I'm not optimistic given the silicone material probably won't take glue very well. Still, cheap enough, but I was in the middle of using it when it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Gage

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and inexpensive basting brushes
customer_reviews.text: These silicone basting brushes perform well for the usual cooking activities requiring a brush. They are a smaller size and work perfectly to coat pastries, garlic bread, etc. The bright orange bristles make them easy to identify in the utensil drawer.
customer_reviews.author: MKremin

customer_reviews.title: For some reason I just can't give it more than 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks fine until you start using it. It doesn't feel right. I used it couple times for baking when brushing my pan with melted butter... It's always messy to use for some reason probably it's the material. I would suggest try other brand. Just 3 stars for this
customer_reviews.author: Aly.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use, but it is a little more difficult to dip and spread liquids, as it doesn’t retain much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of these brushes when opened the package and saw them. Upon using them I was impressed, they work just fine. They just look and feel different than a conventional brush but they do the same job and are much easier to clean. I don't know how long they will last but guess they will surprise me here to. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Brown

customer_reviews.title: The best basting brush available
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't need an excellent basting brush? I certainly did... and then I found these beauties. They hold all the juice you want to brush on, and they can "stand the heat", so they belong in your kitchen!. I'm delighted with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Yes, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Silicon brushes. They work. Have had them for over a month now. Uses them all the time. Don’t need to let them soak, I just clean them right away and put them back. Simple and they do the job well of basting. Would buy again. Price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Basting Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Silicone is always great for kitchen utensils as it is easy to clean. The bristles on these are solid and allow for the easy application of oils and seasonings.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are easy to use and appear to stay cleaner than brushes that look like paint brushes for basting, etc. I like that I can take the heads off to wash. Only thing is I have to soak the brushes to get the odors of oils and spices out because the odors tend to linger in the brushes. Other than that it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big cook or baker, but recently had the need for brushes to do an egg wash. I ordered these brushes & am very pleased w/ them. They were easy to use & got the job done. In addition, they were very easy to clean. I have not had them very long & only used them a couple of times, but they seem like they’ll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith D.

customer_reviews.title: I use them daily
customer_reviews.text: These are well bonded between the silicone head and handle. I have had no issue with delaminating or expansion between the dissimilar materials like I have with other brushes. The bristles are thinner than other brands and apply a very even smooth coverage. Cleanup is painless as well
customer_reviews.author: Polar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brushes
customer_reviews.text: These little brushes are great. We have used them several times to brush bbq sauce on ribs, oil on bread, etc. They have worked very well and have held up in the dishwasher wonderfully. I registered the product via email as described on the packaging. Customer service was great, offering product replacement if I should have issues with the brushes. I will definitely check out their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Mallo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to handle and spreads well
customer_reviews.text: Its exquisitely designed with varying bristle thickness in an appropriate way, flexible beautifully to spread oil or other spreads evenly on rough and uneven surfaces of any items to be baked or heated. You can use less or more oil as you need, and washes easily. Pleasant color and feel. A must kitchen aid. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: SimplyJoy

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe and can stand heat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve already used both and they seem to work great. I used the larger one to baste chicken wings while on the grill and the small one to brush olive oil onto pizza dough before baking. They stand high heat over the grill and the removable heads before tossing in the dishwasher don’t melt, warp or get damaged in any way. I would buy again if more than two were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer29109

customer_reviews.title: Brush keeps falling off
customer_reviews.text: While the brush serves as a great baster, it keeps falling off from the handle. Quite annoying especially when there is thick sauce on the baster that makes it heavy and falls off while applying on the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Reeshan

customer_reviews.title: So Far  Great
customer_reviews.text: Only used these once now and they seem great . The web part of the brush really holds the suace. And I like thet youc an pull the head off to clean no little spaces that anything unwanted can grow
customer_reviews.author: RONALD G WALTON

customer_reviews.title: The brushes broke off after only using it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The brushes broke off after only using it for the first time. I was brushing BBQ sauce on some pork, and the brushes came off both of them. UPDATE: March 10th 2018 this company has a 100% guarantee and replaced these brushes without charge. The new brushes came in and the tops did not come off, so I am changing the review in reflection of this.
customer_reviews.author: Trenaway

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up and grid works well
customer_reviews.text: They are good for what they are. I prefer bristle brushes but wanted a silicone set for ease of cleaning. They have a silicone grid between the rows of bristles that is very good at picking up more of what you're brushing. I would have liked the longer BBQ brush to have a longer handle but they are both fine and do clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: although simple design, works really nice for basting barbecue or oven foods. Really like ease of cleanup, maintain nice clean brush. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: the quality is not very good at all , cheaply made. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times. All good. Holds sauce well and is easy to clean. Especially like the detachable head for cleaning. Haven't used for high heat applications so I cant rate that aspect
customer_reviews.author: Subman619

customer_reviews.title: "New" is apparently a relative term
customer_reviews.text: Product received was in an open box that had been (poorly) scotch taped shut. Upon opening the box, the product appeared to be a returned item (large brushes' bristles were bent and there was a hair on the handle). Item does not appear to have been used, but is clearly not "new". Misrepresentation of a product will always be a 1-star review in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Spread The Love and Sauce
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little combo. I use these to spread sauce or oil or whatever needs spreading. They work well and I toss them in the Dishwasher when I am finished. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shredder

customer_reviews.title: these work nice and have held up well
customer_reviews.text: They work well if you wanna paint juices on your meat but they do not work well with paint. Actually haven't tried to use with paint, probably just keep them for the juice stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Batmango66

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to 'paint' melted chocolate on molds etc. The smaller one looked like the right very small size I need, the only one small enough I could find online. Unfortunately it's too big for my purpose, is actually at least 4 times the size I need. Photo somewhat misleading and no specific size info. But I took the risk and it didn't work. It looks well made, sturdy and would probably be great for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: CAbaker

customer_reviews.title: Don't do the job
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but these just don't do the job. Wanted to brush oil onto veggies for grilling, but most of the oil just stays trapped in the brush. Kind of a useless tool, I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: mn

customer_reviews.title: Y'all need ta waggle some liquid on things?
customer_reviews.text: It splash, it taps'ses, it sprinkles, it dinkles, the only thing it does not do it clean easily...which is good! Cause it's supposed hold liquids securely you ponce! I'll be here all week, just like the rest of you, covid 2020, we're all gonna become introverts or kill ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: the guy

customer_reviews.title: Very cool design
customer_reviews.text: I like brush and the mesh pattern in the middle. It does help to pick up more sauce. I brushed oil on my waffle iron with it. Works like a charm. The product is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: These basting brushes are fantastic! They are so useful when marinating meats, veggies, seafood, etc! They wash easily and brush sauces on well! I am super happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a long time since I’ve used brushes when cooking, finally got some new ones and everything is ok. No worries about them melting and they clean up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Brushes
customer_reviews.text: They are VERY small. I am not sure why they have 2 when both are both very small. They are not the easiest to get clean. That may be better if you put them in the dishwasher. The pictures look better then the item itself. It will work for what I need however.... it was not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Just OK Basting Brushes
customer_reviews.text: These basters are just ok. The good is they work well, and the rubber ends keep the baster sanitary unlike basting brushes made from natural materials. The bad news is that the ends tend to fall off when in use, which is rather frustrating. This is one of those "get what you pay for" items. I will be buying more expensive/higher quality basting brushes next time.
customer_reviews.author: VannahRucker

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of brushes.
customer_reviews.text: Use primarily to coat my frying pans with coconut oil. Works well because I can hold the brush against a hot pan for a few seconds and the heat will melt just a bit of the oil to gather on the brush. Don’t have to heat the oil separately or use a spoon to get the oil out. Cleans in a second or two with a soapy sponge or dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect batter sticks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these for a very long time. Some silicone sticks can be to stiff making it awkward to handle. Not these, they are flexible, easy to clean and just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Slis

customer_reviews.title: Works great and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I like the mesh in the middle of the bristles, as it seems to help hold whatever you are spreading on the brush better than a brush with just the bristles. I also like that these are disaster safe.
customer_reviews.author: kranzie10

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These were a disappointment. Smaller than expected and quite cheap. The Orange ends keep coming off! Great for easy cleaning, buy not for when you are in the middle of using them.
customer_reviews.author: KinDeborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Baster
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you're looking for...at least what I was looking for. Great baster. I didn't anticipate receiving two, but glad I did. Gave one away and enjoying the other.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Darbonne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: "I was a bit skeptical after receiving the product as to if it would spread oil the way I wanted it to. I have used it a few times now and it works just fine. I think the 'bristles' could be a little shorter to provide better control. Overall, I am happy with the purchase."
customer_reviews.author: Ava M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: I did a little research before buying as I was concerned about buying a non bristle brush for basting. However, these work fine. Easy to use that place in the dishwasher. I would recommend to others thinking about a similar purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Better than bristle brushes by far
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! They spread the butter or oil as well as a bristle brush, but they clean up MUCH better! No more not-quite-clean bristles or wondering if you got all the soap out or changing the kind of oil and still tasting the other oil or loosing bristles. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TiazaTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Durable brushes
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the purchase. They are easy to clean because there is enough space between the bristles. They also apply a good amount of sauce on your food.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Basting Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes!! I bought a 2nd set for my daughter in law!! They brush so nice, whether using for hot or cold. They also clean up in the dishwasher perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Would spend a bit more fore a better brand.
customer_reviews.text: Only ehh. They work but the top falls off of the handle. Would spend a bit more fore a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little basting brushes
customer_reviews.text: Just received and hope they will meet all expectations. Used last night and they do work well. I was using butter to baste some bread which took a minute to clean out. Used hot water and Dawn and it came clean. Nice orange color.
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to work with!
customer_reviews.text: The day mKitchen Orange Silicone Basters arrived we were having a BBQ, the timing couldn't have been better. Clean up is easy, doesn't leave strands on food though finer herbs in sauce tend to slip through back into to the bowl. Still better than older 'straw' type ones. I'm still keeping a few of my older type and these, they both have their place in your kitchen drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, and exactly as described! I bought these for my husband for his birthday (after he melted the other one we had) - and they're the best brushes we've had in our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I had looked in stores for this type silicon basting brush with no luck. These brushes hold more liquid due to a thin flat silicon layer with holes in it positioned in the center of the brush. Those holes hold fluid better that the spaces between the bristles. I got used one to spread clarified butter onto layers of phyllo sheets while making Baklava. They worked flawlessly. So far I like them very much. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: John Burks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use silicone basting brush
customer_reviews.text: Use for kichen basting. Handles are not too long. Not too good for spreading meted butter but overall useful & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ELM.NYC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly, we were pleasantly surprised. Also, thank you for the 2 basting e-books that came after very useful and simple recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lkata

customer_reviews.title: easy to handle, spread the oil very well
customer_reviews.text: this is my second review. the first brushes had a sweet chemical odor that I noted, but a replacement set is fine. I thought they were on the small side but it turns out this is a good feature. The small size makes them very flexible and they spread the oil very well. I like them better than some of the other silicone brushes I have purchased. There is a web in the middle that I have seen on only one other brush I have purchased. I think it holds the oil so that you can spread it out better. On the whole I am very satisfied and will purchase them in another color if they have one.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn  C.

customer_reviews.title: So handy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to clean and easy to use. I love that they are silicone so that hair isn't left behind on my baked goods. Love the different sizes. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Lower your calories, not your taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for getting enough, but not too much, butter, or whatever melted or liquid on meat, waffle , vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: ... thicker liquids so if you're using anything that isn't like thick BBQ sauce you'll want to find a standard ...
customer_reviews.text: These are OK for cooking however it only really works with thicker liquids so if you're using anything that isn't like thick BBQ sauce you'll want to find a standard brush (like you'd use for painting).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V. Gordy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are exactly what I needed. They get the job done right! I've tried other brushes and parts of the brush have easily come off but these are very durable. As far as the sizes of the brush heads, they are not drastically different but I do like having two on hand. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got it to clean out my milk frother and it doesn't do as good a job as I was hoping it would
customer_reviews.text: the bristles are too soft for my preference. I got it to clean out my milk frother and it doesn't do as good a job as I was hoping it would. I prefer more firm bristles but if you're using this for something that requires softer bristles, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a hair baster
customer_reviews.text: A decent brush, my only complaint is that it doesn't hold melted butter very well in the bristles/material in the middle. But sauces stick and spread really well.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Baster for items outside oven
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Wouldn't be usable for gas grill or hand might burn. Useable on oven baked items.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gruenhaus

customer_reviews.title: Works b
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these only once. Worked for me. I didn’t use them in very high heat so I’m not sure about that.
customer_reviews.author: shazbot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these and cute colors . Easy to clean and love the net inside , helps baste more juice on my meat
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: As good as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: They work well, holding plenty of whatever you're brushing with and applying it smoothly. They wash easily - by hand or in the dishwasher. Two convenient sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job basting or applying oil to a pan before placing a baked good in it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush
customer_reviews.text: Washing this batting brush is easy because you can detach it from the handle and wash it thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: They do the job well
customer_reviews.text: surprised that they are so soft but when I when I tried them, they did the job very well. That inner layer, that looks like mesh, is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkelement

customer_reviews.title: Great for ribs.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Like how easy they are to clean. Just made ribs for the game. Vikings vs 49er 2020 playoffs.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Dziki

customer_reviews.title: nice basting brushes
customer_reviews.text: Don't know yet about heat resistance but I use these to put olive oil on items before they are baked. Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DMonistere

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are great basting brushes and I feel will last for a long time. And the seller is very concerned and informative and I would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I just be sure to clean with soap and water immediately after so it doesn’t grow mold. I have only used the small one for buttering biscuits so far
customer_reviews.author: Lea Spoonhour

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a baker, so have no idea how these perform as pastry brushes. But for sauces and marinades on meat they're fine. I like being able to pop them in the dishwasher and using something that will stand up to grill heat.
customer_reviews.author: nachrly

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes!
customer_reviews.text: My silicone brushes set is exactly what I've been looking for. For basting indoors or out, it works great AND they are easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Basting Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be good brushes. Expected the handles to be longer but these should work. I haven't had an opportunity to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be pretty high quality and do well in the dishwasher. The one downside is that when I'm brushing butter on things, the silicone bristles all stick together so I don't get as even a brush as I would hope. Usually this only happens with something that's not completely liquid, like almost-melted butter, but it's something that should be kept in mind.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are great little brushes for basting, buttering the top of homemade bread, greasing the waffle iron, and brushing excess flour from the griddle when baking lefse (like a tortilla, made with potatoes). Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basting Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use them but seller was great and timely and they appear to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Holds the sauce really well on the brush and spreads evenly. Cleans easily and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Ann Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: These are good silicone brushes and work better than the bristle brushes I have.good brushes.
customer_reviews.text: These are good silicone brushes and work better than the bristle brushes I have.
customer_reviews.author: Carol MartensPrice

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Actually works better than I thought it holds more sauces than what I used to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well- better than old brushes
customer_reviews.text: These appear durable and much better than old brushes that can leave debris in your food.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff W Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Of all things I dont have in my kitchen was a basting brush so I bought these. They do their job. Only reason for 4 stars is I was putting bbq sauce on ribs and the bristles are so loose it flopped sauce all over. They arent as stiff as I would of guessed.
customer_reviews.author: Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: I love that they're dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after melting a different type while using in too hot of a pan. I've used both of these in the same pan at the same heat with no issues. I love that they're dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works a lot better then i thought it would. Used with bbq, olive oil etc.. Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. I usually do both beef and chicken on BBQ days so a second brush is super handy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Many uses in the kitchen and so much easier to clean that one with bristles.
customer_reviews.author: alegna222

customer_reviews.title: The brush quality is good. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use the brush to apply a coating of the oil for baking . The brushes do serve that purpose. The cleaning is also easy.
customer_reviews.author: shivakumar janardhanan

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had on of these, I’m not sure how I’ve lived without them.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Woods

product_meta.title: M KITCHEN WORLD Silicone Basting - BBQ, Pastry, and Oil Brush (Orange), Turkey Baster, Barbecue Utensil - use for Grilling & Marinating - Desserts Baking, Set of 2 with 2 Recipe Electronic Books
feature_bullets: NO MORE HAIR IN YOUR FOOD: Our high performance flexible M KITCHEN WORLD silicone brushes are premium quality and will not melt, warp, discolor, or shrink like regular plastic or wooden brushes. The bristles will not break or shed in your food like old brushes. They are heat resistant up to 446⁰F / 230⁰C and can be used in the kitchen, the grill and on non-stick pans. The lightweight handle provides a soft comfortable firm grip making basting easy

PREVENT BACTERIA AND MOLD BUILD-UP: The M KITCHEN WORLD basics silicone cooking utensils will not stain or retain odors (great for vinegar, hot butter, egg whites, margarine, oil, basting sauce). The heads prevent bacteria and mold build up and are removable for easy cleaning by hand or in the dishwasher

BETTER AND MORE EFFICIENT SPREAD: The M KITCHEN WORLD Pastry | Basting | BBQ brushes have 4 rows of 15 silicone coated bristles designed to mop up and hold generous amounts of liquid (BBQ sauce, butter glaze) better and more efficiently than average brushes

SAFE TO USE WITH FOOD: The silicone food grade basting brushes are essential kitchen gadgets being BPA-free, made from 100% food grade silicone. The lightweight ergonomic handle is made from high quality green crystal (PP material) for safe cooking. They are essential camping or picnic accessories

100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE & BONUS GIFT: This set of M KITCHEN WORLD essential kitchen gadgets comes with lifetime guarantee and 2 bonus electronic books: “Basting Sauces Recipes” and “Pastry Cream Sauces Recipes”
